page.syntax: Result as C = UI_DLG_REMEMBERED_GET(C title[,C format])

argument.name: Result
argument.description: A character string with seven comma delimited fields:

argument.name: title
argument.description: The name of the dialog box.

page.discussion: The UI_DLG_REMEMBERED_GET() function retrieves alignment, size, and position data for a dialog box from the HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Alpha Software\Alpha Five 6.0\xdialog key in the system registry.

section.title: Example
section.description: This example runs a dialog and then asks what its settings were.
